articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Russian invasion: Biden meets with G7, addresses US on response; Macron vows 'response without weakness' - New Straits Times
articles.description: WASHINGTON: US President Joe Biden was meeting with G7 allies Thursday to hammer out a raft of new sanctions against Russia after it invaded Ukraine, and will later speak to the American people on a crisis that he warns will cause “catastrophic loss of life”.
